Package com.bookingmx.reservation.model

Class Reservation

java.lang.Object
com.bookingmx.reservation.model.Reservation
public class Reservation extends Object
Represents a hotel reservation in the BookingMx system. This class encapsulates all information related to a guest's room booking, including dates, guest information, room details, and pricing. The class includes validation logic to ensure data integrity and business rules such as valid date ranges and non-negative pricing.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
BookingMx Development Team

  • Constructor Details

    • Reservation

      public Reservation()
      Default constructor that generates a unique ID and sets creation date. Status is automatically set to PENDING.

    • Reservation

      public Reservation(String guestName, String guestEmail, LocalDate checkInDate, LocalDate checkOutDate, RoomType roomType) throws InvalidReservationException
      Full constructor for creating a reservation with all details. Automatically generates a unique ID and sets status to PENDING.
      Parameters:
      guestName - the name of the guest making the reservation
      guestEmail - the email address of the guest
      checkInDate - the date when the guest will check in
      checkOutDate - the date when the guest will check out
      roomType - the type of room being reserved
      Throws:
      InvalidReservationException - if any validation fails

    • Reservation

      public Reservation(String guestName, String guestEmail, LocalDate checkInDate, LocalDate checkOutDate, RoomType roomType, double totalPrice) throws InvalidReservationException
      Constructor with pre-calculated total price. Used primarily for testing or when loading existing reservations.
      Parameters:
      guestName - the name of the guest making the reservation
      guestEmail - the email address of the guest
      checkInDate - the date when the guest will check in
      checkOutDate - the date when the guest will check out
      roomType - the type of room being reserved
      totalPrice - the pre-calculated total price
      Throws:
      InvalidReservationException - if any validation fails

  • Method Details

    • calculateTotalPrice

      public double calculateTotalPrice()
      Calculates the total price for the reservation based on room type and number of nights.
      Returns:
      the calculated total price

    • calculateNumberOfNights

      public long calculateNumberOfNights()
      Calculates the number of nights for this reservation.
      Returns:
      the number of nights between check-in and check-out dates

    • cancel

      public void cancel() throws InvalidReservationException
      Cancels this reservation by changing its status to CANCELLED.
      Throws:
      InvalidReservationException - if reservation is already completed or cancelled

    • confirm

      public void confirm() throws InvalidReservationException
      Confirms this reservation by changing its status to CONFIRMED.
      Throws:
      InvalidReservationException - if reservation is not in PENDING status

    • isActive

      public boolean isActive()
      Checks if this reservation is currently active (not cancelled or completed).
      Returns:
      true if reservation is active, false otherwise

    • getId

      public String getId()
      Gets the unique identifier for this reservation.
      Returns:
      the reservation ID

    • setId

      public void setId(String id)
      Sets the unique identifier for this reservation. Used primarily when loading existing reservations from storage.
      Parameters:
      id - the reservation ID to set

    • getGuestName

      public String getGuestName()
      Gets the name of the guest.
      Returns:
      the guest name

    • setGuestName

      public void setGuestName(String guestName) throws InvalidReservationException
      Sets the guest name with validation.
      Parameters:
      guestName - the guest name to set
      Throws:
      InvalidReservationException - if name is null or empty

      Parameters:
      guestEmail - the guest email to set

      InvalidReservationException - if email is null, empty, or invalid format

    • setTotalPrice

      public void setTotalPrice(double totalPrice) throws InvalidReservationException
      Sets the total price. Note: Normally price is calculated automatically, but this setter allows manual override if needed.
      Parameters:
      totalPrice - the total price to set
      Throws:
      InvalidReservationException - if price is negative
